content.question: Which of the following best explains the change in United States military combat deaths in Vietnam between 1964 and 1968 as depicted in the graph?

choices.label: Growing opposition to the Vietnam War by university students in the United States
The end of the alliance between the Soviet Union and the United States
Increasing commitment by politicians in the United States to combat the spread of global communism
The direct intervention of Chinese military forces on the side of the North Vietnamese government

content.answer: Increasing commitment by politicians in the United States to combat the spread of global communism

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
